name: Pexl
description:
Pexl is my first foray into game dev which I've been working on for 8 months.

The goal of Pexl is to move your block to the it's 'shell' of the same shape by only moving the platform and letting gravity do it's thing. It isn't as simple as getting your block to the goal but you have to also keep in mind that your block must be 'hooked' at all times on to the platform so that it doesn't fall through. Try and complete the level in as few moves as possible.

It's ready for testing and would love any kind of feedback

I have 12 levels for testing so far and a further 8 completed. I have many level ideas which include an array of different enemies, bigger platforms, multi platforms etc but I will wait for testing feedback first

Controls: 

(Controls can be changed in the settings menu)

Rotate Left - A

Rotate Right - D

Rotate Up - W

Rotate Down - S

Rotate Anti-Clockwise - Q

Rotate Clockwise - E

Menu - M

Toggle Mode - TAB
